评论详情: Absolutely love this robe!! I almost got the pink one, but I changed my mind to the Night Flowers color at the last second, and I’m so glad I did! It’s gorgeous, and unique. It’s so satiny smooth, I’ve even fallen asleep in it a few times. I was at a hotel the other day with my family, and I was using it as a cover up for the pool, and I went to go out front to take a call, and my husband goes: “You’re really going to go outside in THAT?” I said: “Heck yeah, I look fancy af!” 😆 I wanted to take a star off for it not having pockets, because it IS annoying that it doesn’t have pockets, but I love it so much, it doesn’t feel right to give it anything less than 5. I’m most likely going to get it in the black and pink as well. :)

This robe is amazing.  The quality is VERY NICE.  It is soft and made of good quality.  I wish I had ordered one a long time ago.  It's a little shorter then I wanted,  but I'm 6 feet tall so it's not so unusual to me.  I wish went to the floor,  it hits me around my mid calf. I definitely recommend this robe.
This was a gift, very nice.

评论详情: I love this robe and it was pricy but the quality really shows, it’s soft silky and comfortable. this rob is cooling when you need but also keeps you warm when needed. the colors and patterns are beautiful and the length is perfect( i’m 4’11 and just below my ankles). the rob is also not see through at all. so happy with my purchase!

Definitely worth the money! BUY IT!! I purchase the soft pink color with flowers and a bird on the back. Sorry....I'm so comfy in my robe that I do not feel like getting up and taking a picture!

评论概述: Nice print but sizing is a bit off
评论详情: I bought this for use as a travel robe.  I loved the print and color, for one.  Secondly, the sizing is a bit off for me.  I'm 5'2" and the length is actually fine.  That's the normal issue for me -- well-fitting lengths.  In this case, it's the fact that the robe keeps opening up, and I have to keep retying it multiple times.  There is an inside tie, and I have used it as well as the outside tie.  It just keeps falling open.  I wear XL P or 1X P size, so if you are larger than that it might stay closed on you.  I think it's prob. just too big on me. However, the price is right, and it was a risk which I was wiling to take.  I wish I could leave it a 5 star, but the fit...one size does not fit all.  Since I just intended to use it for travel, it will be sufficient.  It's possible I could have it altered, but I didn't want to incur an additional costs on it.  I haven't washed it yet, and doubt it will shrink much.  Very pretty though.
The robe is nice
Love it!
Planning on ordering another.  The robe is just as pictured.

Beautiful, soft and silky robe! Very comfortable and good quality. Glad it’s washable. Only wish it had a loop for hanging on a hook.
Love it . Real comfy.

I brought this with me on a trip to an onsen so that I could use it as a robe and if it got a little wet, I wouldn’t care too much. It totally did the job and visually it looked beautiful. However, I own quite a few kimono robes and this one is definitely of the lower quality. Fabric is very light and thin which means it won’t drape your body the way you envision. There is no lining. If you want a longer kimono it also doesn’t hit the floor. I’m a short girl, barely 5 ft and this thing is above my ankle. Coverage wise it fits very nicely and is comfy. The fabric texture is not itchy at all, very soft. Like I said it worked for what I ordered it for but if you’re looking for something longer lasting and of higher quality - this ain’t it.
This robe feels like it belongs in a high class accommodation!! It does run big so size down. Well worth the price!
I absolutely love this robe! It feels so soft and silky and helps keep me covered without overheating especially in the summer. Looking forward to wearing this robe for seasons to come

Absolutely love this robe!  Agree that it is slippy, but the inside tie makes it stay in place for me. I didn't notice the lack of hanging loop. The only thing I would want is pockets! But, it looks and feels amazing. It's a combination of very flattering *and* very comfortable. Win win!

It was even beautifully folded and presented in the packaging. Very impressive, particularly for the price. It drapes beautifully, and you'll feel like a movie star in it. Not practical (for me, anyway) as an ordinary robe because it's too "slippery," but for a decadent weekend or something special, it's gorgeous and feels amazing.

She loves it and wears it every morning! She loves how lightweight it is and it is very soft. I dropped off one star because I wish the pattern continued on the inside. 10/10 if you run hot but want to feel cozy.

This is a soft silk long comfortable kimono robe Light weight because it's silken material It's very nice for spring, summer, fall wear. Mine is white and purple colors. Very pretty.
Beautiful bathrobe..soft and comfortable. Very high end looking..
Very pretty and flowy.

I really love this robe and even though I have one or two things I could say miss the mark, honestly, I’m still really happy with this purchase. I went with the dark green one with the white flowers and cranes and it’s really subtle and beautiful. I might even order another one just to rotate. I have my eye on that bright red one as well.  My biggest complaint is that there’s no loop to hang this by. That seems like such a silly oversight. I don’t like hanging any clothing on hooks by the material itself, and especially not in the case of something silky like this. For the time being, I’ve been draping the entire robe over the hook so as not to stress the fabric or damage it at all and who knows, maybe that’s just what I’ll have to do forever. Not a huge deal, but it’s the biggest reason I’m not rating this 5 stars.  Be aware that the material is extremely silky, which is great, but that means it doesn’t grip well, so you’ll need to use the inside tie to keep things in place. You’ll also need to either double knot the sash or pull it very tight to keep it from slipping. That’s just the nature of this type of material.  It’s a lovely robe. If only they’d put a loop so I could hang it up, I’d have given it a 5/5.  Edit to add: I went to a tailor and they were happy to add a loop to the robe. It was easy and $10 and you can’t even tell from the other side. Whenever I decide to order a second one, I’ll go and ask the tailor to add a loop to that one as well (yeah, I love the robe enough that I’ll order a second one, even though I still think this company deserves the biggest eye roll for leaving that out).

Very lovely looking but, the fabric is just too slippery slinky.  The ties and slash come undone almost immediately even when double knotted, neither the belt slash nor the inner ties hold their bow or knot for more than just a few minutes.  They won’t stay tied!  Doubled,  knotted or bowed.  Very frustrating.  I will now have to sew on snaps, and sew the belt slash onto the robe.  I love the look and feel of the fabric, so I am not returning it.  I just think the manufacturer could have made this robe better.  A wardrobe malfunction will happen after a few minutes of wear!  Buyer beware!
It’s adorable and the only minor issue is that the fabric is super slippery, which is to be expected. Lovely robe.

评论概述: Pretty, but the inside tie is wrong.
评论详情: Got this as a gift from a family member and it looks beautiful, but the inside ties are wrong (they both start at different places within the inner robe, and mine start at the opposite of where they're supposed to). They're at opposite places, which forces you to put the right side of the kimono over the left. Putting the right side of a kimono over the left signifies death/a deceased person.  There are two inner ties, one that begins at the end of the robe, and one that begins at the inner arm of the robe. The one that begins at the inner arm of the robe is supposed to be on the left side, the one that begins at the end of the robe is supposed to be on the right side in order to force you to wear the robe left over right.
